amendatorysection.catchline: Death penalty cases; Supreme Court; orders.
amendatorysection.para: In all cases when the death penalty has been imposed by the district court, the Supreme Court shall, after consideration of the appeal, order the prisoner to be discharged, a new trial to be had, or appoint a day certain for the execution of the sentence.

source.note: The repeal of section 29-2528 by Laws 2015, LB 268, section 35, is not effective because of the vote on the referendum at the November 2016 general election. This version of section 29-2528 is found in the 2008 Reissue of Volume 2A of the Revised Statutes of Nebraska.
